detectors.description:
Reentrancy in InverseLending.deposit(uint256) (samples/tc/minimalsanitized/contracts_cleaned/ms_tc_021.sol#66-69):
	External calls:
	- IERC20(collateralToken).transferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),amount) (samples/tc/minimalsanitized/contracts_cleaned/ms_tc_021.sol#67)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- positions[msg.sender].collateral += amount (samples/tc/minimalsanitized/contracts_cleaned/ms_tc_021.sol#68)
